item.name: Smoke Test Flow
item.description: Complete end-to-end flow: Register → Login → Promote-to-owner → Create Property → Submit → Approve → Public GET → Booking Request → Owner Accept → Wallet Top-up → Booking Confirmed → Review Create → Admin Mock Email Preview
